item.title: Ecco the Dolphin and Ecco: The Tides of Time remasters announced alongside third Ecco game
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/ecco-the-dolphin-and-ecco-the-tides-of-time-remasters-announced-alongside-third-ecco-game

Countdown website ends on April 25, 2026.

Remastered versions of the Genesis games Ecco the Dolphin and Ecco: The Tides of Time are in the works from series creator Ed Annunziata, he announced in an Xbox Wire interview. Once those are complete, Annunziata will begin work on a new, third game in the series.

“Me and the entire original team are going to remaster the original Ecco the Dolphin and [Ecco: The] Tides of Time games,” Annunziata said. “Then we will make a new, third game with contemporary play and GPU sensibilities. Stay tuned to eccothedolphin.com.”

The website features a countdown ending on April 25, 2026 at 9:00 a.m. PT / 12:00 p.m. ET.

Further information was not announced.

item.title: Tinkerlands launches in Early Access on May 23
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/tinkerlands-launches-in-early-access-on-may-23

  • PC

Explore, craft, and fight your way on uncharted islands.

Tinkerlands will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam on May 23, publisher HypeTrain Digital and developers CodeManu and endless Coffee announced.

The Early Access release will be playable in both single-player and multiplayer, and feature a large main island, three major islands, and multiple minor islands to discover, as well as more than 10 unique bosses, a class system and events that change the state of islands, various side activities, and over 2,000 items and objects.

The game is expected to remain in Early Access for six to eight months, but that can change depending on user feedback. The full release will add one to three major islands, additional minor islands, new gameplay systems, endgame content, expanded crafting and exploration, expanded NPC interactions, and additional language support.

Here is an overview of the game, via HypeTrain Digital:

About

In Tinkerlands, players find themselves stranded on an island. They must craft, scavenge equipment, build a town for fellow survivors, and face various dangers in this mysterious world!

Key Features

  • Explore the Islands – The islands are full of things to explore. Enhance your character’s strength by discovering loot and crafting weapons and gear.
  • Build a Town – Establish a community where diverse characters can join and assist you throughout your adventure.
  • Craft and Find Loot – Collect resources from the island’s environment and vanquish monsters to craft formidable weapons—or less powerful ones, if that’s your preference.
  • Fantasy Allowed – These islands harbor magic, peculiar creatures, and even things that defy the laws of physics. Let your imagination run wild!
